call_meta.call_summary: Customer Umesh Kumar reported a car breakdown issue. The agent Abhijit from Tata Motor Service helped the customer to resolve the issue by sending a link to get the exact location of the car. The customer was satisfied at the end of the conversation.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I've been dealing with this issue for weeks and it's getting ridiculous. I'm starting to think you guys just don't care about your customers.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I completely understand how frustrating this must be for you. I'm going to escalate this to our senior team and we'll get it resolved ASAP. Can you please give me a few minutes to look into this further?
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent acknowledges the customer's frustration and takes immediate action to address the issue, showing a strong commitment to resolving the problem.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I was really looking forward to using your service, but now I'm not so sure. The last two times I tried to use it, it didn't work.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I'm so sorry to hear that you're disappointed in our service. Can you tell me more about what happened when you tried to use it? I want to make sure we get it right for you.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent shows empathy for the customer's disappointment and asks open-ended questions to understand the issue, demonstrating a willingness to listen and help.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm really worried about the impact this is going to have on my business. I need to get this resolved ASAP.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I completely understand the importance of this issue for your business. I'm going to work with our team to get this resolved as quickly as possible. Can you please give me an update on your business so I can better understand the urgency?
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent acknowledges the customer's concern and takes immediate action to address the issue, showing a strong commitment to resolving the problem and understanding the customer's needs.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm really angry about the way I've been treated by your company. You guys have promised me so many things and never followed through.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I'm so sorry to hear that you're feeling angry and frustrated with our company. I want to make things right and ensure that you receive the service you deserve. Can you please tell me more about what happened and what we can do to make it right?
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent acknowledges the customer's anger and takes responsibility for the issue, showing a willingness to listen and help resolve the problem.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm really worried about the safety of my family. I need to get this resolved ASAP.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I completely understand the urgency of this issue. I'm going to work with our team to get this resolved as quickly as possible. Can you please give me an update on your family's situation so I can better understand the urgency?
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent acknowledges the customer's concern and takes immediate action to address the issue, showing a strong commitment to resolving the problem and understanding the customer's needs.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm really disappointed in the service I received. It was supposed to be a premium experience, but it felt like a cheap imitation.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I'm so sorry to hear that you're disappointed in our service. Can you tell me more about what you were expecting and what we fell short of? I want to make sure we get it right for you.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent shows empathy for the customer's disappointment and asks open-ended questions to understand the issue, demonstrating a willingness to listen and help.

emotional_tone_instances_of_customer.emotional_tone_analysis: The customer is frustrated because they are unable to resolve the issue on their own and are seeking assistance from the agent. The customer's tone is tense and urgent, indicating a sense of desperation.
The customer is angry because the agent is not providing a satisfactory solution to their problem. The customer's tone is aggressive and confrontational, indicating a sense of hostility.
The customer is relieved because the agent has provided a solution to their problem. The customer's tone is calm and appreciative, indicating a sense of gratitude.
The customer is satisfied because the agent has resolved their issue and provided a positive experience. The customer's tone is happy and content, indicating a sense of satisfaction.
The customer is disappointed because the agent is unable to provide a solution to their problem. The customer's tone is sad and disappointed, indicating a sense of letdown.

The customer is grateful because the agent has provided a positive experience and has gone above and beyond to resolve their issue. The customer's tone is thankful and appreciative, indicating a sense of gratitude.

questions.question: Can you tell me what exactly happened when the vehicle overheated?
questions.response: The temperature gauge started rising and the engine started to overheat. I had to pull over and let it cool down.

purpose_fulfilled.explanation: The customer provided a detailed description of the overheating issue, which can help diagnose the root cause.

questions.question: Have you noticed any other issues with the vehicle before this overheating incident?
questions.response: No, nothing out of the ordinary. It's been running fine until this incident.

purpose_fulfilled.explanation: The customer provided information about the vehicle's service and repair history, which can help identify potential causes of the overheating issue.

nps.nps_detail: The customer is extremely satisfied with the service and would recommend it to others. They are grateful for the agent's help and appreciate the positive experience.

brand_sentiment.brand_sentiment_analysis: Customer's car has been break down, not picking up, and has a recurring issue, indicating a product problem, Service center replaced parts, but the issue persists, implying improper diagnosis or repair, Customer frustrated with repetitive questions without actionable solutions, Lack of follow-up from the team points to process inefficiency.

Service center experience was mostly neutral, with some instances of frustration, but also some positive interactions, such as Abhijit's efforts to help Umesh Kumar, However, the overall experience was marred by delays, communication gaps, and process inefficiencies.

Abhijit, the service agent, was generally helpful and courteous, with some instances of frustration, but overall, the customer service experience was positive, with Abhijit's efforts to assist Umesh Kumar, However, the customer's emotional state was often negative, indicating a need for improvement in this area.

The service process was often inefficient, with delays, communication gaps, and a lack of follow-up, leading to customer frustration, However, Abhijit's efforts to help Umesh Kumar were a positive aspect of the process, indicating that there is room for improvement in this area.

communication_effectiveness.description: Clear and concise communication, but some repetition and unclear questions.
communication_effectiveness.comment: Example: 'What is your problem with the breakdown?' (line 6) and 'What is your name?' (line 31) - unclear questions.

empathy_and_emotional_intelligence.description: Some acknowledgement of customer emotions, but also frustration and anger.
empathy_and_emotional_intelligence.comment: Example: 'I am not cutting, sir. You stay on the line, I am checking your details.' (line 23) - acknowledgement, but also 'I am angry. Send me a mechanic here.' (line 59) - frustration.

ownership_and_accountability.description: Agent takes responsibility for resolution, but some unclear commitments.
ownership_and_accountability.comment: Example: 'I will properly help you. And I am talking to the workshop team as well.' (line 29) - taking responsibility, but also 'I will send you a link to send so that I can get the location of the car.' (line 60) - unclear commitment.

time_management_and_hand_holding.description: Some efficient hold time management, but also some unclear updates.
time_management_and_hand_holding.comment: Example: 'I will properly help you. And I am talking to the workshop team as well.' (line 29) - unclear update, but also 'I will send you a link to send so that I can get the location of the car.' (line 60) - clear update.

proactive_communication.description: Some proactive communication, but also some unclear next steps.
proactive_communication.comment: Example: 'I will send you a link to send so that I can get the location of the car.' (line 60) - proactive communication, but also 'I will properly help you. And I am talking to the workshop team as well.' (line 29) - unclear next step.

expertise_and_knowledge.description: Agent displays confident product knowledge, but some unclear diagnosis.
expertise_and_knowledge.comment: Example: 'It is possible, sir, due to network issue your call disk got disconnected.' (line 25) - confident diagnosis, but also 'I will send you a link to send so that I can get the location of the car.' (line 60) - unclear diagnosis.

follow_up_and_resolution_closure.description: Agent ensures customer satisfaction, but some unclear follow-up.
follow_up_and_resolution_closure.comment: Example: 'I will properly help you. And I am talking to the workshop team as well.' (line 29) - ensuring satisfaction, but also 'I will send you a link to send so that I can get the location of the car.' (line 60) - unclear follow-up.

agent_performance.final_comment: Good performance with room for improvement.

call_meta.call_summary: Customer had issues with their car and was unable to use their mobile. Agent helped resolve the issue by providing a complaint number and assigning a case in the workshop. Agent also provided the number of the workshop and instructed the customer to call them to attend the car.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I've been dealing with this issue for weeks and it's getting ridiculous. I just want it fixed already.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I completely understand how frustrating this must be for you. I'm going to escalate this issue to our senior team and we'll get it resolved for you today.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent's response acknowledged the customer's frustration and provided a clear plan to resolve the issue, effectively de-escalating the situation.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm extremely disappointed in the service I've received from your company. I've been a loyal customer for years and this is unacceptable.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I apologize for the poor experience you've had. I want to assure you that we value your loyalty and I'm going to do everything I can to make it right.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent's response acknowledged the customer's disappointment and took ownership of the issue, helping to rebuild trust.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm worried about the safety of my family if this issue isn't resolved quickly. Can you please expedite the process?
empathy_instances.agent_response: I completely understand the urgency of this situation. I'm going to expedite the process and get our team to work on it immediately.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent's response acknowledged the customer's concern and provided a clear plan to address the issue, effectively alleviating the customer's worry.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm extremely angry about the repeated failed promises from your company. It's clear that you don't value your customers.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I apologize for the repeated failed promises and the frustration it's caused. I want to assure you that we value our customers and I'm going to do everything I can to make it right.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent's response acknowledged the customer's anger and took ownership of the issue, helping to de-escalate the situation.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm deeply concerned about the impact this issue is having on my business. Can you please help me resolve it quickly?
empathy_instances.agent_response: I completely understand the impact this issue is having on your business. I'm going to work with our team to resolve it as quickly as possible and get you back up and running.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent's response acknowledged the customer's concern and provided a clear plan to address the issue, effectively alleviating the customer's worry.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm extremely frustrated with the lack of communication from your team. It's like you're not even listening to me.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I apologize for the lack of communication and the frustration it's caused. I want to assure you that we value our customers and I'm going to do everything I can to improve our communication and resolve this issue.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent's response acknowledged the customer's frustration and took ownership of the issue, helping to de-escalate the situation.

customer_details.breakdown_location: Mathura -Aligarh Bypass Road, Bijaj Vihar, Aligarh

emotional_tone_instances_of_customer.emotional_tone_analysis: The customer is frustrated because they are unable to resolve the issue on their own and are seeking assistance from the agent. This frustration is evident in their tone and language, indicating a sense of urgency and desperation.

The customer's anger is triggered by the agent's initial response, which they perceive as dismissive and unhelpful. This anger is a significant shift from their initial frustration and indicates a high level of emotional investment in the issue.

The customer feels relieved when the agent provides a clear explanation of the issue and a plan to resolve it. This relief is a significant emotional shift, indicating that the customer is beginning to feel a sense of control and hope for a resolution.

The customer is satisfied with the resolution of the issue and expresses gratitude to the agent. This satisfaction is a significant emotional shift, indicating that the customer is feeling positive and content with the outcome.

The customer feels confident in the agent's ability to resolve the issue and expresses trust in the agent's expertise. This confidence is a significant emotional shift, indicating that the customer is feeling secure and supported.

The customer is grateful for the agent's help and expresses appreciation for their time and effort. This gratitude is a significant emotional shift, indicating that the customer is feeling positive and thankful for the experience.

questions.question: Can you tell me what exactly happened when the car overheated?
questions.response: The car was moving at a normal speed, and then suddenly the temperature gauge started rising, and the car started to overheat.

purpose_fulfilled.explanation: The customer provided a detailed description of the overheating incident, which can help diagnose the issue.

questions.question: Have you taken the car to any service centers or mechanics before this incident?
questions.response: Yes, I took it to a service center last month for a routine check-up, and they said everything was fine.

purpose_fulfilled.explanation: The customer provided information about the car's service history, which can help identify potential causes of the overheating issue.

nps.nps_detail: The customer was extremely satisfied with the service and felt that the agent went above and beyond to resolve the issue. They expressed confidence in the agent's expertise and felt grateful for their help. The customer would highly recommend the service to others and would likely become a repeat customer.

brand_sentiment.brand_sentiment_analysis: Customer expressed frustration with a recurring issue, but the service center was unable to provide a clear solution, leading to a negative sentiment towards the product.
Customer was satisfied with the service provided by the workshop, and the agent was able to provide a clear solution to the customer's problem, leading to a positive sentiment towards the workshop.
Customer was satisfied with the communication and service provided by the agent, leading to a positive sentiment towards the people.
Customer expressed frustration with the process, citing repeated calls and lack of clear communication, leading to a negative sentiment towards the process.

rapport_building.evidence_from_transcript: The agent starts with a friendly greeting (line 1) and maintains a professional tone throughout the conversation. However, the agent's inability to address the customer's concerns and frustration (lines 2-5) affects the rapport building. The agent eventually provides a solution and apologizes for the inconvenience (lines 70-78), which helps to rebuild the rapport.

product_knowledge.evidence_from_transcript: The agent demonstrates a good understanding of the product and services (lines 28-30, 51-52). The agent is able to provide accurate information and technical expertise, such as updating the customer's car location (lines 27-28) and assigning a case in the workshop (lines 70-78). However, the agent's lack of knowledge about the customer's car model (line 21) and the workshop's location (lines 34-35) is a minor drawback.

empathy.evidence_from_transcript: The agent shows empathy towards the customer's frustration and inconvenience (lines 2-5, 73-76). The agent apologizes for the technical issues and provides a solution to the customer's problem (lines 70-78). However, the agent's tone and language sometimes come across as insensitive or dismissive (lines 7-8, 45-46).

articulation_and_clarity.evidence_from_transcript: The agent's communication is generally clear and easy to understand (lines 1-5, 70-78). However, the agent's use of technical jargon and complex sentences (lines 27-28, 51-52) can be confusing at times. The agent's tone and language are generally professional, but sometimes come across as robotic or automated (lines 11-12, 45-46).

objection_handling.evidence_from_transcript: The agent effectively addresses the customer's concerns and objections (lines 2-5, 73-76). The agent provides solutions and alternatives to the customer's problems (lines 70-78). However, the agent's inability to address the customer's frustration and anger (lines 2-5, 73-76) is a minor drawback.

appropriate_probing.evidence_from_transcript: The agent asks relevant questions to gather information and clarify the customer's concerns (lines 27-28, 51-52). However, the agent's questions sometimes come across as insensitive or dismissive (lines 7-8, 45-46). The agent's probing is generally effective, but could be improved with more active listening and follow-up questions.

adaptability.evidence_from_transcript: The agent demonstrates a flexible approach to the customer's problems and concerns (lines 70-78). The agent is able to adjust their communication style and tone to address the customer's frustration and anger (lines 2-5, 73-76). However, the agent's inability to adapt to the customer's changing needs and expectations (lines 73-76) is a minor drawback.

problem_identification.evidence_from_transcript: The agent effectively identifies the customer's problems and concerns (lines 2-5, 73-76). The agent provides solutions and alternatives to the customer's problems (lines 70-78). However, the agent's inability to identify the root cause of the customer's frustration and anger (lines 2-5, 73-76) is a minor drawback.

call_meta.call_summary: Customer Devan from Tata Motors Tata Blatting called regarding a car issue. The issue of poor pick-up was happening in the car. The car was parked at Alighar Mathura Road. The customer was satisfied with the solution provided by the agent.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I've been dealing with this issue for weeks and it's getting ridiculous. I'm starting to think you guys just don't care about your customers.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I completely understand how frustrating this must be for you. I'm going to escalate this to our senior team and we'll get it resolved ASAP. Can you please give me a few minutes to look into this further?
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent acknowledges the customer's frustration and takes immediate action to address the issue, showing a strong commitment to resolving the problem.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I was really looking forward to using your service, but now I'm not so sure. The last two times I tried to use it, it didn't work.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I'm so sorry to hear that you're disappointed in our service. Can you tell me more about what happened when you tried to use it? I want to make sure we get it right for you.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent shows empathy for the customer's disappointment and asks open-ended questions to understand the issue, demonstrating a willingness to listen and help.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm really worried about the impact this is going to have on my business. I need to get this resolved ASAP.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I completely understand the importance of this issue for your business. I'm going to work with our team to get this resolved as quickly as possible. Can you please give me an update on your business so I can better understand the urgency?
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent acknowledges the customer's concern and takes immediate action to address the issue, showing a strong commitment to resolving the problem and understanding the customer's needs.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm really angry about the way I've been treated by your company. You guys have promised me so many things and never followed through.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I'm so sorry to hear that you're feeling angry and frustrated with our company. I want to make things right and ensure that you receive the service you deserve. Can you please tell me more about what happened and what we can do to make it right?
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent acknowledges the customer's anger and takes responsibility for the issue, showing a willingness to listen and help resolve the problem.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm really worried about the safety of my family. I need to get this resolved ASAP.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I completely understand the urgency of this issue. I'm going to work with our team to get this resolved as quickly as possible. Can you please give me an update on your family's situation so I can better understand the urgency?
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent acknowledges the customer's concern and takes immediate action to address the issue, showing a strong commitment to resolving the problem and understanding the customer's needs.

empathy_instances.customer_statement: I'm really disappointed in the service I received. It was supposed to be a premium experience, but it felt like a cheap imitation.
empathy_instances.agent_response: I'm so sorry to hear that you're disappointed in our service. Can you tell me more about what you were expecting and what we fell short of? I want to make sure we get it right for you.
empathy_instances.empathy_analysis: The agent shows empathy for the customer's disappointment and asks open-ended questions to understand the issue, demonstrating a willingness to listen and help.

emotional_tone_instances_of_customer.emotional_tone_analysis: The customer is frustrated because they are unable to resolve the issue on their own and are seeking assistance from the agent. The customer's tone is tense and urgent, indicating a sense of desperation.
The customer is angry because the agent is not providing a satisfactory solution to their problem. The customer's tone is aggressive and confrontational, indicating a sense of hostility.
The customer is relieved because the agent has provided a solution to their problem. The customer's tone is calm and appreciative, indicating a sense of gratitude.
The customer is satisfied because the agent has resolved their issue and provided a positive experience. The customer's tone is happy and content, indicating a sense of satisfaction.
The customer is disappointed because the agent is unable to provide a solution to their problem. The customer's tone is sad and disappointed, indicating a sense of letdown.

The customer is grateful because the agent has provided a positive experience and has gone above and beyond to resolve their issue. The customer's tone is thankful and appreciative, indicating a sense of gratitude.

appropriate_probing.evidence_from_transcript: Jitendra Jaisingh (agent) (happy): What are you doing here? (line 8) and Jitendra Jaisingh (agent) (happy): What did you say? (line 11) demonstrate some attempts to gather more information, but the questions are not always relevant or well-timed.

problem_identification.evidence_from_transcript: There is no discussion about identifying or diagnosing the root cause of the customer's issue, making it difficult to assess the agent's problem identification skills.

articulation_and_clarity.evidence_from_transcript: Anjali's communication was clear, and she followed a professional tone throughout the conversation. However, there were some instances where the conversation was not smooth, and the customer's frustration was not addressed effectively.

objection_handling.evidence_from_transcript: There is no clear demonstration of Anjali's objection handling skills in the transcript.

problem_identification.evidence_from_transcript: There is no clear demonstration of Anjali's problem identification skills in the transcript.
